# vImage.ReflectionAxis.horizontal

**Case**

Reflect the image horizontally across the center vertical line.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontal
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.ReflectionAxis.vertical**: Reflect the image vertically across the center horizontal line.
